Question: This person published a total of 323 original covers for The Saturday Evening Post over 47 years.
Hints: This person's Breaking Home Ties sold for $15.4 million at a 2006 Sotheby's auction.
This person married his first wife, Irene O'Connor, in 1916.
This person married his third wife, retired Milton Academy English teacher Mary Leete "Molly" Punderson, on October 25, 1961.
